Hi Matt,

No problem, me, I'm at the other end of the age thing, well 49, a=
lmost
blind, and have been teaching sword play for nigh on 23 years, which =
I
got in to by mistake and have never regretted it:-) My other half Mary
is=
 also disabled, with a spinal injury, but she's dam good with a sword,
neve=
r should have taught her everything I know....

Good luck with your life pl=
ans, and remember to make a difference, and
then just enjoy the ride!

Your=
s
